biotools.summary: GRiNCH (Graph-Regularized NMF and Clustering for Hi-C) is a tool for simultaneous smoothing and detection of topological units of genome organization from sparse chromatin contact count matrices with matrix factorization.

bioschemas.name: GRiNCH
bioschemas.summary: GRiNCH (Graph-Regularized NMF and Clustering for Hi-C) is a tool for simultaneous smoothing and detection of topological units of genome organization from sparse chromatin contact count matrices with matrix factorization.
